info.name: google search center the search result for 27
info.description:
Must read
Improved browsing experience on wild screens. Save your neck.
google search center the search result for 27  2k screen.
google search result align with center.

you should set regex rule by yourself in order to work.
https://www\.google\.com/search\?q=.*
https://www\.google\.com/search\?.*

if you have two monitor, one is laptop.
in order to not affect your laptop screen
you can acces this website https://howbigismybrowser.com/
and then set min-with: your pc scrren browser width + 1
